latest.title: 1. Kalma Tayyab
latest.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ مُحَمَّدٌ رَسُولُ اللهِ
latest.translation: Allah ke siwa koi Maabood nahi aur Muhammad (SAW) Allah ke Rasool hain.

latest.title: 2. Ayatul Kursi
latest.arabic: اللّهُ لاَ إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
latest.translation: Allah! There is no god but He - the Living, The Self-subsisting, Eternal.

latest.title: 3. Surah Ikhlas
latest.translation: Say, He is Allah, [who is] One.

latest.title: 4. Surah Falaq
latest.translation: Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak.

latest.title: 5. Surah Nas
latest.translation: Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind.

latest.title: 6. Darood Ibrahim
latest.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
latest.translation: O Allah, let Your Mercy come upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.

latest.title: 7. Dua for Parents
latest.translation: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small.

latest.title: 8. Dua Before Eating
latest.translation: In the name of Allah and with the blessings of Allah.

latest.title: 9. Dua for Traveling
latest.translation: Glory to Him who has subjected this to us.

latest.title: 10. Rabbana Dua
latest.translation: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good.
